name: UpCloud
description: High-performance cloud hosting provider offering scalable virtual servers and reliable infrastructure solutions.
longDescription: UpCloud is a European cloud infrastructure provider known for its high-performance, scalable, and reliable cloud services. Headquartered in Finland, UpCloud offers flexible virtual private servers, managed Kubernetes solutions, and robust storage services with a strong emphasis on performance and uptime. Fully GDPR compliant and ISO27001 certified, UpCloud ensures security, transparency, and compliance across its infrastructure.

productDetails.name: Virtual Private Servers
productDetails.description: Powerful, reliable virtual servers with flexible resource allocation and excellent performance.

productDetails.name: Managed Kubernetes
productDetails.description: Fully managed Kubernetes service for seamless container orchestration and deployment.

productDetails.name: Object Storage
productDetails.description: Scalable and secure object storage designed for reliability and ease of access.

productDetails.name: Private Cloud
productDetails.description: Tailored private cloud solutions for enterprises seeking enhanced control and security.
